44.bfd: Koronavirus, mə bɨ kɨɨ twoŋə nɨ KOVID-19, àa nɨ̀ghɔ̀ɔ̀ ni feè. Ni lɛ mfùù m̀fɛ̀ʼɛ̀ a China a nɨ NJwi mùghûm mitarə̀ ntsù mɔʼɔ̀ a nɨ saŋ kɨrɨsə̀ 2019. ƗꞋ lɨŋsə bə̀ aa tsò ɨjɔ̀ʼɔ̀. Ǹzi nɨ nɨ̀wô Nɨ jàʼarə mə ǹghɛɛ nɨ ntoò toò fàa m̀bî. Kàa à dɨ̀gə̀ yii nɨ̀ghɔ̀ɔ̀ nû ǹlo ghu aà bɨ burə̀ tɨ zî.
44.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

45.bfd: Koronavirus, mə bɨ kɨɨ twoŋə nɨ KOVID-19, àa nɨ̀ghɔ̀ɔ̀ ni feè. Ni lɛ mfùù m̀fɛ̀ʼɛ̀ a China a nɨ NJwi mùghûm mitarə̀ ntsù mɔʼɔ̀ a nɨ saŋ kɨrɨsə̀ 2019. ƗꞋ lɨŋsə bə̀ aa tsò ɨjɔ̀ʼɔ̀. Ǹzi nɨ nɨ̀wô Nɨ jàʼarə mə ǹghɛɛ nɨ ntoò toò fàa m̀bî. Kàa à dɨ̀gə̀ yii nɨ̀ghɔ̀ɔ̀ nû ǹlo ghu aà bɨ burə̀ tɨ zî.
45.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

46.bfd: Koronavirus, mə bɨ kɨɨ twoŋə nɨ KOVID-19, àa nɨ̀ghɔ̀ɔ̀ ni feè. Ni lɛ mfùù m̀fɛ̀ʼɛ̀ a China a nɨ NJwi mùghûm mitarə̀ ntsù mɔʼɔ̀ a nɨ saŋ kɨrɨsə̀ 2019. ƗꞋ lɨŋsə bə̀ aa tsò ɨjɔ̀ʼɔ̀. Ǹzi nɨ nɨ̀wô Nɨ jàʼarə mə ǹghɛɛ nɨ ntoò toò fàa m̀bî. Kàa à dɨ̀gə̀ yii nɨ̀ghɔ̀ɔ̀ nû ǹlo ghu aà bɨ burə̀ tɨ zî.
46.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

55.en: Person with a heart condition or disease

56.en: Person with a heart condition or disease

57.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

70.bfd: Ɨ̀liŋsə koronavirus ju kɨ bə̀ aa tsǒ jɨ ǹjɔ̀ʼɔ̀. Fibà, à kwɛʼɛ yì yoorə, mɨ̀kɨ̀rɨ̀nə̀ mi yaŋnə̀ nɨ̀kaà, bə̀ bi mɔ̀ʼɔ yuʼù nɨ nyàŋə̂ ɨ̀jɔ̀ʼɔ̀ sɨgɨ̀nə̀ nɨ mɨlwî. Ntɔ̀ŋ yaŋə̀ a mî nɨ mɨ̀tswɛ kɨkaŋə a toonsə̀. Kàa bə bimɔʼɔ tswe nɨ nu tɨ yuʼu ni nyaŋe, bə bi ghàʼàntə̀ tɨ̀ɨ̀ tɨ kwɛtə.
70.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

71.bfd: Ɨ̀liŋsə koronavirus ju kɨ bə̀ aa tsǒ jɨ ǹjɔ̀ʼɔ̀. Fibà, à kwɛʼɛ yì yoorə, mɨ̀kɨ̀rɨ̀nə̀ mi yaŋnə̀ nɨ̀kaà, bə̀ bi mɔ̀ʼɔ yuʼù nɨ nyàŋə̂ ɨ̀jɔ̀ʼɔ̀ sɨgɨ̀nə̀ nɨ mɨlwî. Ntɔ̀ŋ yaŋə̀ a mî nɨ mɨ̀tswɛ kɨkaŋə a toonsə̀. Kàa bə bimɔʼɔ tswe nɨ nu tɨ yuʼu ni nyaŋe, bə bi ghàʼàntə̀ tɨ̀ɨ̀ tɨ kwɛtə.
71.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

72.bfd: Ɨ̀liŋsə koronavirus ju kɨ bə̀ aa tsǒ jɨ ǹjɔ̀ʼɔ̀. Fibà, à kwɛʼɛ yì yoorə, mɨ̀kɨ̀rɨ̀nə̀ mi yaŋnə̀ nɨ̀kaà, bə̀ bi mɔ̀ʼɔ yuʼù nɨ nyàŋə̂ ɨ̀jɔ̀ʼɔ̀ sɨgɨ̀nə̀ nɨ mɨlwî. Ntɔ̀ŋ yaŋə̀ a mî nɨ mɨ̀tswɛ kɨkaŋə a toonsə̀. Kàa bə bimɔʼɔ tswe nɨ nu tɨ yuʼu ni nyaŋe, bə bi ghàʼàntə̀ tɨ̀ɨ̀ tɨ kwɛtə.
72.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

77.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

78.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

95.en: 2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.

96.en: 2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.

103.bfd: 4. Tsùù m̀bà yî mbɨ̀ʼɨ kɨ kurə kə kɨ mɔ̀ɔ̀ntə̀ nɨ nàà.
103.en: 4. Avoid eating raw meat and touching live animals.

130.en: 9. Keep informed and verify the source of information.

145.bfd: Ŋù nt sɨ̀m ta yə mə yu ghɨrə ànnù yii akuʼu nə aa a mbɛ mbɨ̀ɨ̀ nu yi bo bɨ bə̀ bìi bɨ tswe a mbɛɛ yu aà.
145.en: Everyone must be responsible and take the right steps to protect themselves and those around them.

146.bfd: Ŋù nt sɨ̀m ta yə mə yu ghɨrə ànnù yii akuʼu nə aa a mbɛ mbɨ̀ɨ̀ nu yi bo bɨ bə̀ bìi bɨ tswe a mbɛɛ yu aà.
146.en: Everyone must be responsible and take the right steps to protect themselves and those around them.
